story_summary: Kolya Krassotkin is left alone to care for the doctor’s wife’s two children while the adults are away attending to an emergency involving their servant Katerina. Despite his desire to go out on urgent business, Kolya stays to watch over the children and entertains them with a toy cannon and his dog Perezvon. When the servant Agafya returns from the market, Kolya entrusts her with watching the children before finally leaving the house.
evidence_quotes: Kolya was thus left for a time to protect and look after “the kids.”
“Listen, you frivolous young woman,” Krassotkin began, getting up from the sofa.
